dialogue.introduction: Asashio-class destroyer, Asagumo, reporting in! So you're the Commander... huh. Hmm. Well, it's fine. I'll do it!
dialogue.library_intro: Asashio-class destroyer number 5, Asagumo. Together with my sworn friend Yamagumo, we made it through many battlefields. That's right, the 9th DesDiv. Famous, right? Eh, you haven't heard of us? You know, I don't really like jokes. Remember that!
dialogue.secretary2: Whaat? I'm pretty busy, you know.
dialogue.secretary3: What is it, geez. Eh, you're interested in Asagumo? Then it can't be helped, huh.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Wh-What? There's nothing for me to do? Well, it's fine, but kinda annoying. I know, shall I massage your shoulders? Ah, I'm kidding. Just kidding, of course!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander...Its good that you're working hard, but if you overdo things, it makes me worried, seriously! Yes, make sure you rest appropriately...got it?
dialogue.wedding: What, Commander? I'm pretty busy here... Heh, what? Another joke. ...Eh, you're serious? Ah, what do I do... Y-Yamagumo is... Ehh, umm...
dialogue.show_players_score: That's right, you always need to check your information. Isn't that common sense?
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: DesDiv 9 moving out. You heard that, Yamagumo? Follow me!
dialogue.equipment2: My, is it alright? Yeah, yeah.
dialogue.equipment3: I'll take it off your hands!
dialogue.expedition_selection: I'll take it off your hands!
dialogue.resource_collection: I'll take it off your hands!
dialogue.instant_repair: I'll take it off your hands!
dialogue.development: I'll take it off your hands!
dialogue.supply: That's right, supplies are important. Ah, I see, you knew that already, Commander.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'll take a bath. D-Don't peek, ok?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm getting in the bath. Geez, even though I said to properly service my turbine!
dialogue.ship_construction: Commander, it seems a new child has been completed. I wonder what they'll be like?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Mission complete. The fleet has returned to base. It's good to see everyone's safe.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Destroyer Asagumo, setting sail. Leave it to me.
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy ships spotted! We can do this, begin firing!
dialogue.attack: Don't mess with DesDiv 9! We can do it, keep moving forward!
dialogue.night_battle: Night battle, huh. Yep, let's do this!
dialogue.mvp: See, isn't it me? I won't lose to the likes of the Kagerou-class. Obviously!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Tch... That hurts, you know! Quit it!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I...I've been beaten...but, I can still navigate..! As if I'll sink!
dialogue.sunk: ...Fufu, Yamagumo... We're together again. It's not like I'm... like I'm lonely, you know...
dialogue.christmas_2014: Christmas, huh...? I see, this is... not bad at all. So this is (Christmas) cake... *noms*
dialogue.new_year_2015: It's the new year! Commander, Happy New Year! I'll accompany you this year too. Don't worry!
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Eh? I didn't get any chocolate for you, you know! What do you mean? Th-these aren't what you think, okay!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: So today is a special day? Command, good for you. I'm a little bit happy too.

hourly.0000: Commander! It's gotten pretty late... I'll keep you company for today. It just became midnight, after all!
hourly.0100: It's 0100! The night's a bit cold...
hourly.0200: It's 0200...? What's with that face...? I'm not particularly sleepy or anything. you know?
hourly.0300: It's 0300...? Commander... are you feeling drowsy? You have terrible bags under your eyes... Are you not getting enough sleep? Its fine if you have a nap, I'll be on night watch from here on.
hourly.0400: Its 0400, huh... These early morning hours are cold... I don't hate it, though... What do you think, Commander... oh you fell asleep...?
hourly.0500: It's 0500! Commander! Get up! We have to go wake everyone up soon! Hey, are you listening?
hourly.0600: It's become 0600! Everyone, raise up! Okay? ...Commander? Are you even awake?
hourly.0700: It's 0700! Breakfast time... bread is fine, isn't it? Toast? Aren't you demanding...here you go.
hourly.0800: 0800... I'll take care of the plates, pass them here. Ah, the jam on the toast was good, wasn't it? Yamagumo gave it to me!
hourly.0900: Its 0900. Its about time for the fleet to seriously start running...please use us destroyers well, too! Commander? Are you listening?
hourly.1000: Its 1000 huh... Are the expeditions okay? Our tasks are progressing at a good rate...all thats left is...uh, commander? What are you doing? Hey?
hourly.1100: Its 1100. Can I have lunch with Yamagumo? I promised her. Ah, she's not a bad girl, really! I guarantee it!
hourly.1200: Its 1200 right? Commander, this is my best friend Yamagumo. She's a little weird, but please look after her! Uhh... Yamagumo, where are you going? Hey!
hourly.1300: 1300. Commander, sorry...it seems like she had something on her mind...I'll ask her about it later! Sorry...how strange though...
hourly.1400: Its 1400 now. As an apology for not eating lunch with you, I bought this at the canteen. We can eat this together...or rather, I'll give it to you, okay?
hourly.1500: Its 1500 huh...Ah! It's Kirishima-san! Welcome back! Yes, Asagumo has been doing well! Yes!
hourly.1600: Its 1600 now. Eh, my attitude towards Kirishima-san is different? Of course, that person is amazing! After all, I saw it! Mmm, I saw it!
hourly.1700: 1700. It's about time to prepare dinner. Ah don't worry, I'll prepare it! I said I'll do it, don't worry about it!
hourly.1800: Its 1800 now. Okay, dinner is served! Eh, you're complaining about the barley rice? What are you talking about, this is the basis of the dish! It's also very nutritious!
hourly.1900: 1900. Hm? But the yellowtail teriyaki was delicious? I know right? It goes will with barley and rice, doesn't it?
hourly.2000: It's become 2000. The night...the night is not my strong point. Ah, don't worry, I'm fine....now...
hourly.2100: Its 2100 now. Oh, Yamagumo? What is it? No no, thats wrong! That's absolutely wrong! Jeez!
hourly.2200: 2200. Yamagumo has some kind of misunderstanding...sometimes she goes into la-la land with her thoughts. She's usually pretty normal though...
hourly.2300: Its 2300, huh...its completely nighttime now. The naval base is...not very quiet though. Yeah, I'll have to go give a warning.
